title: Spending - Manisa
text:
Here you can see the expenditures of political parties in the lead-up to the elections according to the latest data.

9 Feb - 9 Mar 20243 Mar - 9 Mar 2024


During this period, political parties spent a total of ₺749,717 and displayed 267 advertisements on Meta.
